question: Ref Q 4969 , would Chicken Feet be regarded pure irrespective by whom it has been cut
answer:
QUESTION
Refering to the answer given to Q 4969 , would Chicken Feet be regarded pure irrespective by whom it has been cut
ANSWER


Share:
If the chicken was not slaughtered according to the Shari'ah laws of Zabah,
the chicken feet will not be Halaal.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
